issue.title: FindParquet searches for non-existent header
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-72](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-72). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
FindParquet currently searches for parquet/parquet.h which is not part of parquet-cpp.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-72?focusedCommentId=15205508) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 30
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/30>
